pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'FactSet' Engines API Client // Allow clients to fetch 'analytics' through API for Portfolio 'Analytics'('PA'), Style Performance Risk('SPAR') and 'Vault' products of 'FactSet'. Visit https://github.com/factset/analyticsapi-engines-r- sdk/tree/master/Engines for more information on the usage of package. Visit https://developer.factset.com/ for more information on products.
